S08n655:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n655:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīye kalpavisare sarvasādhanopayike mantracaryābhiyuktasya sādhanakāle sarvamantrāṇāṃ sarvakalpavistareṣu rāhurāgamanasurāṇāmadhipateḥ sarvagrahānāyakasya grahasaṃjñā candradivākarādiṣu nakṣatrayogena dṛśyante |
S08n655:3: ta śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru te bhāṣiṣye ||
S08n655:4: evamukte bhagavatā śākyamuninā samyak sambuddhena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatastriḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃ tenāñjali pragṛhya bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya punarevotthāya bhagavantamanimiṣaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ utphullanayano bhūtvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭo bhagavantamevamāha - tat sādhu bhagavāṃ nirdiśatu rāhorāgamanam ;
S08n655:5: yatra sattvānāṃ mantracaryābhiyuktānāṃ siddhikālaṃ bhaveyuriti sarvasattvānāṃ ca sukhodayaṃ śubhāśubhanimittaṃ vā;
S08n655:8: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya sādhukāramadāt |
S08n655:9: sādhu mañjuśrīḥ ! yastvaṃ tathāgatametamatha paripraśnase sarvasattvānāṃ ca hitāyodyuktaḥ |
S08n655:14: yadā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ vartate ca mahad bhayam |
S08n655:21: apsarāṃ prekṣate daityaḥ yadā kāle nabhastalam ||
S08n655:22: tadā candramasapūrṇaḥ kare vāme sa daityarāṭ |
S08n655:26: tadā tārkikā mānavā āhuḥ āgreyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vibhoḥ |
S08n655:27: yadā tu nīlarakte'smiṃ prabhā nīlatāṃ vrajet ||
S08n655:28: tadā nīlamiti jñeyaṃ śaśine bhāskare'pi vā |
S08n655:35: tasmāt tathāgataṃ jñānaṃ samyak tena niyojayet ||
S08n655:38: yadā kāle bhuvi martyānāṃ rāhorāgamanaṃ bhuvi |
S08n655:42: ubhau tau yugmataḥ grāsaṃ divā rātrau ca kathyate |
S08n655:44: bharaṇyāṃ tu yadā candraṃ ravervā maṇḍalāśrayet |
S08n655:46: kṛttikāsu yadā candraḥ rāhunā grasyate dhruvam |
S08n655:47: rātrau vā yadi prabhāte vā yāmānte ninditaṃ hitam ||
S08n655:48: tadā vindyā mahad duḥkhaṃ vyādhisambhavameva vā |
S08n655:51: mṛgaśirāsu yadā candraḥ bhāskaro vā nabhastale ||
S08n655:52: rāhuṇā grastapūrvau tau astaṃ yātau maharddhikau |
S08n655:60: puṇyāśleṣau yadā candre bhāskare vā nabhastale |
S08n655:64: rāhuṇā saha mudyanto astaṃ yātau grahottamau |
S08n655:68: madhyāhne'thavā rātre ca mucyate ca punaḥ kṣaṇāt |
S08n655:71: grastau saha mucyete astaṃ yātau ca duḥkhadā ||
S08n655:74: diśaḥ sarve samantādvai durbhikṣaṃ cāpi nirdiśet |
S08n655:81: udayantaṃ tadā grastaṃ uditaṃ vāpi sarvataḥ ||
S08n655:82: astaṃ yātena tenaiva śaśino rāhuṇā sadā |
S08n655:86: rājā vai naśyate tatra vyādhinā saha mūrchitaḥ |
S08n655:88: tatra duḥkhaṃ mahāvyādhi tatra dṛśyati bhūtale |
S08n655:94: uttarāyāṃ yadā yuktaḥ nakṣatre bhadrapade tathā |
S08n655:95: rāhurāgamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ divā rātrau tu ninditam ||
S08n655:96: revatyāṃ tu yadā candraḥ rāhuṇā grasta sarvataḥ |
S08n655:103: nakṣatramālā vicitrā vai bhramate vai nabhastale ||
S08n655:106: nakṣatraṃ kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tasya taṃ kurute'nyathā |
S08n655:107: īṣat pramāṇaṃ na doṣo'sti bahuvācāsti ninditam ||
S08n655:109: kālaṃ kathitaṃ jñeyaṃ niyamaṃ caiva kīrtyate ||
S08n655:111: sagrahau yadi tatrasthau ravicandrau tu dṛśyate ||
S08n655:113: anyathā niṣphalaṃ vidyāt prabhāvaṃ vāpi nindite ||
S08n655:116: tadā mahad bhayaṃ vidyāt paracakrabhayet tadā |
S08n655:117: śaśine bhāskare cāpi dhūmravarṇo yadā bhavet ||
S08n655:118: paryeṣā dvitrayo vā vā tatra vidyānmahad bhayam |
S08n655:121: grīṣme śarade caiva dhūmikā yadi jāyate ||
S08n655:122: samantāt saptarātraṃ tu tatra vidyānmahad bhayam |
S08n655:123: divā vā yadi vā rātrau dhūmikā yadi jāyate ||
S08n655:125: pūrvavat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā nirghāt ulkinām ||
S08n655:129: śarade yadi hemante grīṣme prāvṛṣe'pi vā ||
S08n655:131: śubhāśubhaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ divā vā yadi vāniśā ||
S08n655:132: niḥphalaṃ cāpi vidyā vai saphalāṃ cāpi kīrttitām |
S08n655:134: tatra dhūmo bhaved yadyat samantāścaiva nabhastale |
S08n655:135: acirāt tatra tad rājyaṃ ghātyate śastribhiḥ sadā ||
S08n655:144: grīṣme ca kathitā mṛtyuḥ śaratkāle ca ninditam |
S08n655:145: hemante ca vasante ca tāmravarṇaḥ pradṛśyate ||
S08n655:148: prāvṛḍkāle tathā śubhre pīto vā na ca + + + + |
S08n655:153: atikaṣṭaṃ surā hyetaṃ bhayaṃ vā rasadūṣitam ||
S08n655:154: mahāpraṇādaṃ ghoraṃ ca śukre vai ca nabhastale |
S08n655:157: sagrahe bhāskare candre yadā rāho mahadbhaye ||
S08n655:162: vividhā vā na vā sarve vividhā prāṇasambhavāḥ |
S08n655:166: sarve te sādhyamāne vai siddhiṃ gaccheyu sagrahā |
S08n655:167: grahe candre yadā bhāno rāhuṇārtho'pi sagrahe ||
S08n655:168: tasmiṃ kāle tadā jāpī mantramāvartayet sadā |
S08n655:170: sattvopakāraṃ phalaṃ hyetat pratiṣṭhā tatra dṛśyate |
S08n655:171: sidhyante mantrarāṭ kṣipraṃ grahe japtā sarāhuke ||
S08n655:175: vidhiyuktāstu vai mantrā vihīnāṃ neṣyate dhruvam ||
S08n655:180: mantre sujapte yukte ca tantrayuktena hetunā |
S08n655:183: sidhyante sagrahā kṣiptā japtā kāleṣu yojitā ||
S08n655:187: vidyā karmaphalaṃ caiva hetu cānya niyojayet ||
S08n655:189: dadyāt karmaphalaṃ kṣipraṃ sā vidyā hetuyojitā ||
S08n655:190: sā vidyā phalato jñeyā buddhaiścāpi supūjitā |
S08n655:192: pradadyuḥ karmato siddhiṃ sā vidyā karmasu yojitā |
S08n655:193: śreyasā caiva yojayet na mantrāṇāṃ gatigocaram ||
S08n655:195: niḥphalaṃ karmato vā vā phalaṃ karmaṃ ca tatra ca ||
S08n655:198: na phalaṃ karma kramaṃ hanti nāphalaṃ karma kriyā parā |
S08n655:201: mantrarāṭ siddhyate tatra phalā karmeṣu yojitā ||
S08n655:203: na yoniḥ karmato jñeyaṃ yo niyuktaḥ sadā phale ||
S08n655:208: na guṇaṃ dravyato jñeyaṃ nādravyaṃ guṇamucyate |
S08n655:216: prabhavaṃ sarvataḥ karma guṇadravyaṃ ca siddhyate |
S08n655:219: mānasā mantranirdiṣṭā na vācā manasā vinā ||
S08n655:220: vānyato mantravijñeyā na vānyā manase vinā |
S08n655:223: samyag dṛṣṭi tathā karmaṃ vāk cittaṃ ca yojitam ||
S08n655:229: na cittena vinā mantraṃ na smṛtyā saha cittayoḥ ||
S08n655:230: samyak smṛtyā ca citte ca dṛśyate mantrasiddhaye |
S08n655:231: na smṛtyā ca vinirmuktā mantra uktastathāgataiḥ ||
S08n655:233: dṛśyante ūrjitaṃ mantraiḥ sidhyante ca samādhinā ||
S08n655:236: sidhyante mantrarāṭ tatra yogaṃ cāpi supuṣkalam |
S08n655:242: saṅkalpā mantra sidhyante samyak te vidhiyojitāḥ |
S08n655:243: na pūjya mantrarāṭ sarve samyak saṅkalpavarjitāḥ ||
S08n655:246: ājīve śuddhitāṃ yāti mantrā samyak prayojitā |
S08n655:248: ājīvaṃ hi phalaṃ yukto samyageva suyojayet |
S08n655:249: samyak sañjīvarato mantrī śuddhacittaḥ sadā śucau ||
S08n655:252: kravyādā yetarā mantrā ye cānye parikīrtitā |
S08n655:257: svayaṃ na sidhyate vidhinā hīnā aśaucācārarateṣvapi ||
S08n655:259: tasmānmantraṃ na kurvīta vidhihīnaṃ tu karmayoḥ ||
S08n655:261: sādhyāstu tathā mantrā āryā buddhaistu bhāṣitā ||
